website_summaries.verdict: Whether you want a Rubik's toy built for kids or a unique one suited for collecting, this is a good pick.
pros: A Rubik's Cube puzzle made especially for youngsters, thanks to the easy-to-grip design and cute bear character
Easy for little kids to solve
cons: Older kids and adults won't find it very challenging, but it's still an adorable addition to a Rubik's Cube collection

customer_reviews.title: Stickers peel quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his 5 year old sister for Christmas. She was pretty excited it is fairly simple to solve for most people, although a few of us did have a hard time figuring it out and we had to pass it off to my son. He is a whiz at Rubik’s cubes. The only thing that disappointed us was that it is stickers, and they started to peel the day we opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BEGINNER PUZZLE FOR KIDS!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PUZZLE FOR YOUNGER KIDS. IT'S RELATIVELY EASY TO SOLVE AND IS DEFINITELY MEANT FOR A YOUNGER AUDIENCE. MY SON LOVES THIS PUZZLE AND I'M SURE AT SOME POINT, HE'LL GRADUATE TO THE 3X3X3 OR HIGHER. OVERALL, THE QUALITY IS DECENT AND MY YOUNGEST HAS PLAYED WITH IT FOR COUNTLESS HOURS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The shape of the puzzle is cute but puzzle is untwistable ....
customer_reviews.author: Steven Elfant

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Rubik's cuber collector!
customer_reviews.text: Added the Rubiks bear to my 8 yr old collection, smooth turns and easy to solve!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rosario

customer_reviews.title: For my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute. I won’t find out till Christmas and see how he likes it
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 & 9 year olds are into Rubix cubes - I purchased the bear ones for the 4 year olds. They LOVED them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too easy for my 4 yo and too hard for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but too easy for my 4 yo and too hard for my 3 yo. Not sure who would enjoy working with it. Ended up at decoration for the toy room.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: great for little hands. Four year old grandson is working on it while his big brothers play with their cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ann K

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the best movement
customer_reviews.text: Cute look but so so operation. Bought it to build interest for future cubers.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Very easy to solve
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Very easy to solve...my 6-year old Neice will get and enjoy this
customer_reviews.author: MugsyG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids who need a challenge but are not ready for the 4 or 9 square Rubik's cubes.
customer_reviews.author: sharkgideon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This will be a perfect stocking stuffer for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but simple
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but very simple.I got this for my 4 year old and it didn't take him very long to figure it out -- cute idea though and I'm sure he'll pick it up from time to time to play with, just didn't occupy him for very long.
customer_reviews.author: KarenT

customer_reviews.title: Portability
customer_reviews.text: Definitely for a 3-4 yrs old :) Nice and small for travel
customer_reviews.author: angel21cma

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids seem to enjoy playing with it!! Also it was a panda and they love pandas!
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: My girls LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: We got this from the Santa train this year and we gave it to our 8 and 6 year olds for Christmas from Santa. They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

product_meta.title: Rubik's Cube Jr. (White Bear)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Rubik's Junior puzzle game is an entry into the Rubik's solving world, and is ideal for "little problem solvers." The 3 x 2 x 1 twistable puzzle is a cute and familiar character that is easy for small hands to grip. It's simple to solve and will entertain children while encouraging their imagination and learning! Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro. Rubik’s used under license Rubik’s Brand Ltd. All rights reserved. www.rubiks.com
feature_bullets: Rubik's puzzle but easier for kids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
